title: Is a SANUS Full-Motion Mount Right for You?
description:
If you want your TV to extend, retract, tilt, and swivel in all directions to target multiple seating areas, then check out the SANUS full-motion line.  A full-motion mount is the perfect solution when you have a large space and need multiple viewing angles for any seat in the room—all at the touch of a fingertip.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of SANUS TV & Speaker Mounts. Shop for the SANUS Full-Motion Mount at Abt today!
